extension_setup.title: üîß Browser Extension Setup Guide
content: ‚Ä¢ Select your browser (Chrome, Firefox, Edge, Opera)
‚Ä¢ The extension file will download to your Downloads folder
1. Open browser and go to: chrome://extensions/
1. Open Firefox and go to: about:addons
2. Click the gear icon ‚Üí 'Install Add-on From File'
‚Ä¢ Make sure Video Downloader Pro is running
‚Ä¢ Status icon turns green when connected
‚Ä¢ Check system tray for connection status
1. Visit any supported video site (YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, etc.)
2. Look for the Video Downloader Pro icon near videos
3. Click the icon to see available qualities
5. Download window appears automatically in Video Downloader Pro
‚Ä¢ Make sure Video Downloader Pro is running
‚Ä¢ Check if extension is enabled in browser extensions page
‚Ä¢ Check if port 8799 is blocked by firewall
‚Ä¢ Make sure app is not blocked by antivirus
Include browser version and error screenshots

updates_info.title: üîÑ UPDATES & MAINTENANCE SYSTEM
content: Include: Version number, error screenshot, Windows version

faqs.question: ‚ùì Why is my download progress not showing?
faqs.answer:
This is usually caused by yt-dlp output format changes. Try these fixes:
1. Update yt-dlp via Settings ‚Üí Dependency Management
2. Restart the application
3. Try a different video URL
4. Check if download actually started (check download folder)
5. Enable verbose logging in settings

faqs.question: ‚ùì How do I fix 'No module named PySide6' error?
faqs.answer:
This means PySide6 is not installed. Solutions:
1. Reinstall Video Downloader Pro completely
2. Install Python packages: pip install PySide6
3. Use the bundled EXE version instead of Python script
4. Contact support for standalone installer

faqs.question: ‚ùì Why does extension say 'Cannot connect to app'?
faqs.answer:
Connection issues between extension and app:
1. Make sure Video Downloader Pro is running
2. Check if port 8799 is blocked by firewall
3. Restart both browser and app
4. Verify extension is properly installed
5. Check Windows Firewall settings

faqs.question: ‚ùì How to download 8K or 4K videos?
faqs.answer:
Requirements for high-quality downloads:
1. Premium license required for 4K/8K
2. Source video must be available in that quality
3. Sufficient disk space (8K videos can be 5GB+)
4. Good internet connection (50Mbps+ recommended)
5. Select quality in extension or main app

faqs.question: ‚ùì Why is download speed very slow?
faqs.answer:
Speed optimization tips:
1. Enable aria2c in Settings for faster downloads
2. Reduce concurrent downloads to 1
3. Check your internet speed
4. Try different video (some servers are slower)
5. Close bandwidth-heavy applications

faqs.question: ‚ùì How to fix 'FFmpeg not found' error?
faqs.answer:
FFmpeg is required for audio/video merging:
1. Click 'Install Dependencies' in Settings
2. Download FFmpeg from ffmpeg.org
3. Place ffmpeg.exe in app directory
4. Add FFmpeg to system PATH
5. Restart application

faqs.question: ‚ùì Why does app crash on startup?
faqs.answer:
Startup crash solutions:
1. Run as Administrator
2. Check antivirus isn't blocking it
3. Reinstall the application
4. Update Windows to latest version
5. Install Visual C++ Redistributables

faqs.question: ‚ùì How to download from private/age-restricted videos?
faqs.answer:
For restricted content:
1. Login to the website in browser first
2. Use browser extension (it uses your logged-in session)
3. Some private videos cannot be downloaded
4. Age-restricted videos may require cookies

faqs.question: ‚ùì Can I schedule downloads for later?
faqs.answer:
Yes! Download scheduler features:
1. Go to Settings ‚Üí Scheduler
2. Set time and date for download
3. Add video URLs to queue
4. App will download automatically at scheduled time
5. Requires app to be running in background

faqs.question: ‚ùì How to batch download multiple videos?
faqs.answer:
Batch download methods:
1. Add multiple URLs one by one in main app
2. Use playlist URL (YouTube playlists supported)
3. Create text file with URLs and import
4. Use browser extension to queue multiple videos
5. Maximum 10 concurrent downloads

faqs.question: ‚ùì Why is audio missing from downloaded video?
faqs.answer:
Audio extraction issues:
1. Install FFmpeg (required for audio merging)
2. Try different quality option
3. Some formats don't support audio
4. Use 'Extract Audio' option instead
5. Check if source video has audio

faqs.question: ‚ùì How to change download folder?
faqs.answer:
Changing save location:
1. Click 'Browse' in download window
2. Select new folder
3. Check 'Remember location' to save permanently
4. Default folder: Downloads/Video Downloader Pro
5. Can set different folders for different types

faqs.question: ‚ùì Is Video Downloader Pro safe?
faqs.answer:
Security guarantees:
1. 100% virus-free (verified by VirusTotal)
2. No data collection or tracking
3. All processing happens on your computer
4. Open-source components (yt-dlp, FFmpeg)
5. Regular security updates

faqs.question: ‚ùì How to update the app manually?
faqs.answer:
Manual update process:
1. Download latest version from website
2. Close Video Downloader Pro
3. Run installer
4. Follow installation steps
5. Settings and downloads are preserved

faqs.question: ‚ùì Why does extension button not appear?
faqs.answer:
Extension visibility issues:
1. Make sure extension is installed and enabled
2. Refresh the webpage
3. Some sites block download buttons
4. Try different browser
5. Update extension to latest version

faqs.question: ‚ùì How to resume failed download?
faqs.answer:
Download resumption:
1. Click download button again
2. yt-dlp automatically resumes from breakpoint
3. Make sure original file still exists
4. Same download location required
5. Internet connection must be stable

faqs.question: ‚ùì Can I use on multiple computers?
faqs.answer:
Multi-computer usage:
1. Pro license: Up to 3 devices
2. Install on each computer
3. Use same license key
4. Background service runs on each
5. Settings sync manually

faqs.question: ‚ùì How to contact support?
faqs.answer:
Support channels:
1. Email: support@videodownloader.fwh.is
2. Website contact form
3. Include: Version number, error details, screenshots
4. Response time: 24-48 hours
5. Priority support for Pro users

faqs.question: ‚ùì What's the difference between Free and Pro?
faqs.answer:
Feature comparison:
‚Ä¢ **Free:** 5 downloads, 720p max, basic support
‚Ä¢ **Pro:** Unlimited downloads, 8K quality, priority support
‚Ä¢ **Premium:** All features + beta access + dedicated support
‚Ä¢ Upgrade in Settings ‚Üí License Activation

faqs.question: ‚ùì How to uninstall completely?
faqs.answer:
Complete uninstallation:
1. Close app and background service
2. Use Windows Add/Remove Programs
3. Delete download folder if needed
4. Remove from startup registry
5. Contact support for cleanup script

troubleshooting.title: üõ†Ô∏è COMPREHENSIVE TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE
content: **Symptoms:** Click download, nothing happens or immediate failure
2. ‚úÖ Verify URL is valid and accessible
**Symptoms:** Download works but progress stays at 0%
1. ‚úÖ Wait 30 seconds (some videos take time to start)
2. ‚úÖ Check download folder for growing file
1. ‚úÖ Make sure main app is running
**Symptoms:** App closes unexpectedly or becomes unresponsive
**Symptoms:** Downloads much slower than internet speed
**Symptoms:** Video has no sound or separate audio file
1. **Restart Everything:** Close app, browser, restart computer
2. **Update All:** Update app, yt-dlp, FFmpeg, browser
3. **Clean Install:** Uninstall, delete app data, reinstall
5. **Test Basic:** Try simple YouTube video first
‚Ä¢ Keep app updated to latest version
5. **Update Check:** Manual and auto update verification

If nothing works:
1. Export your license key
2. Complete uninstall
3. Delete all app data from AppData
4. Fresh install from website
5. Import license key

**Email:** support@videodownloader.fwh.is
**Response Time:** 24-48 hours
**Include:** Error screenshots, app version, Windows version, steps tried

For technical users:
1. Check Windows Event Viewer for errors
2. Monitor port 8799 with netstat
3. Review yt-dlp logs in temp folder
4. Test with command-line yt-dlp
5. Check system resources during download

settings_guide.title: ‚öôÔ∏è COMPLETE SETTINGS GUIDE
content: ‚Ä¢ **Auto-create subfolders:** By date, site, or type
‚Ä¢ **Cache Size:** Disk cache for faster repeats
‚Ä¢ **Export Settings:** Save all settings to file
